name: Syncee for Suppliers
author: Syncee

sections.description:
Reach more potential B2B retail partners nationally and internationally. Expand distribution by supplying your products on Syncee Marketplace. Build your B2B dropshipping or wholesale network easily.

Grow Your B2B Network

Seize the opportunity to be part of a network of trustworthy suppliers from US, CA, EU, UK, AU, and all over the world. On Syncee Marketplace, there are millions of ready-to-sell products from reliable suppliers with fast shipping. Would you also like to sell your stock easily here? Join Syncee now, and reach more potential retail partners!

Quick & Easy Onboarding and Product Synchronization

The onboarding for suppliers is quick and easy, Syncee has a user-friendly platform. The product integration via your WooCommerce store is very simple and smooth, and you can access useful pricing and catalog settings too. Provide your own shipping details, company description, and every other useful information to resellers.

Automated Uploads & Updates

The application automatically manages product data uploads and updates on a daily basis directly from your WooCommerce store into Syncee Marketplace and into your retail partners’ stores. We make sure our clients can avoid overselling.

Automated Order Synchronization

The application will automatically forward those orders to your WooCommerce account which are paid by the retailer in Syncee. After this, you just simply have to fulfill the order. Payments go from the retailer to the supplier directly through a secure channel.

Free of Charge

For suppliers it is completely free to use Syncee and to be listed on Syncee Marketplace with their products. There are no set up fees, no hidden fees, and no commission. It is a great opportunity for you to expand your retailer network for free!

Dropshippers and Wholesalers

There are both dropshippers and wholesalers listed on Syncee Marketplace. In the intelligent search tool retailers also have the chance to choose which logistic method they prefer and can decide accordingly.

Enjoy the benefits of Syncee as a supplier

  • No set up fees, no commission, no hidden fees
  • More potential B2B partners globally
  • Quick & easy onboarding
  • Auto product uploads & updates
  • Automated order sync
  • Direct supplier-retailer chat
  • Private supplier solution: You can choose to be able to work with only those retailers you bring
  • Add your recommended price margin
  • Customize your shipping conditions
  • Free support
sections.faq:
How much does it cost to use Syncee as a supplier?

For suppliers, it is completely free to use Syncee and to be listed on Syncee Marketplace with their products. There are no set up fees, no hidden fees, and no commission.

How do I reach out to Syncee’s customer support?

You can contact Syncee’s support team by email at suppliers@syncee.co, via in-app chat or the website’s live chat. If you have a question you can also check the Help Center for useful articles.

What are the requirements to be a listed supplier on Syncee Marketplace?

You need to have your physical inventory and quality, unique products so you can be listed on Syncee Marketplace. You also need to be a reliable company with a short lead time. Syncee prioritizes suppliers located in the USA, Europe, and Australia, but we are open to all suppliers globally who fit our requirements.

Website

syncee.co

Terms of Use

Visit the Syncee plugin’s Terms of Use page

Privacy Policy

Visit the Syncee plugin’s Privacy Policy page

Documentation

After installing and activating the Syncee plugin, click on the Syncee menu in your WordPress admin’s side bar. You will have to allow Syncee to access your WooCommerce store via API. When you are ready with it, you have to register to Syncee. You will be redirected to its individual registration page (installer.syncee.co). This registration is needed so your WooCommerce store can be connected to your Syncee profile. When you are ready with these steps, you can use Syncee with your WordPress WooCommerce store, and can search for and also upload products to your store via the plugin.
For more details on how Syncee works, read the plugin’s Help Center.

  2. Quick and seamless onboarding

  3. Automate the product updates and order sync

  4. Customize shipping conditions

  5. Chat with retailers directly
sections.reviews:
Useless in Europe

By alyvegermany on April 18, 2023

Don't sell this in Europe if you cannot provide EUR currency! Useless for European suppliers.

Connection Easy, Platform Flaws

By cameronsmith82 on October 27, 2022

The installation of the plugin and connection between our website and the syncee platform was very easy, very quick. The support provided by Syncee eas excellent to setup our account, map the appropriate attributes and fields from our WooCommerce shop onto the Syncee platform, filter out products not suitable for dropshipping, establish a catalogue and setup pricing. Ongoing support has been prompt and resolution has been continually satisfactory. They helped us manage our listing whilst the brewery was shutdown and we couldn't fulfil any orders. The system also automatically updates each day, so any changes that I make on our WooCommerce site, that meets the criteria laid out on the Syncee platform, will automatically be updated. 5-stars thus far. Where the platform does not meet our needs, is in the currency. As a supplier, we are forced to deal in only USD. Retailers can choose their currency, and as we are only selling in the UK, our prices are exchanged from GBP into USD. Then back from USD into GBP. Transaction are processed by PayPal, which are in USD, so there is another exchange here. In total, we are looking at about 8-9% of the purchase price in exchange fees. Whilst Syncee doesn't seem to be making anything out of this, there is about 1-1.5% variation on the mid-market rate each time, and then PayPal adds in about 4% FX fees, plus their standard transaction fee. As a result, we've had to keep our prices high, so our retailers aren't making much margin (about 13%), and our profits are approximately £2.5 on a £24.5 sale. Hence, the rating is dropped to 3-star. If USD currency is not an issue for you, then this platform will perform better for you financially.

Easy to connect, but...

By therab on March 30, 2022

The plugin is easy to connect. And syncee support is very helpful to set up your data and synchronization with syncee. Don't try to do it all alone, just ask their support in the chat right in your member area at syncee. They can help you with filters and other settings that you can't change by yourself. Despite all efforts of the very helpful support, in the end, we won't use Syncee as long as they don't handle currencies other than US$ - since we need EUR to make it work for us (and our accounting).

Easy to connect

By Anonymous User 20267404 (anonymized_20267404) on February 18, 2022

Fast and great support. The plugin is easy to use and can be connected fast to the syncee account. Automatic receiving of orders from the syncee system to the website is a superb function.

Great App

By Katherine Michell Gordillo Quispe (divinedulcet) on October 11, 2021

Very good app, in other supplier applications I have to update my products manually and in Syncee it is automatic, as well as the support service is good, they give a quick solution.

short_description: Sell your products to more dropship retailers globally, expand your WooCommerce store's distribution network easily.
